text: PhinDeli Town Buford, originally known as Buford, is an unincorporated community in Albany County, Wyoming, United States. In 2013, it had only 1 resident.PhinDeli Town Buford: Open for businessAmericaâ€™s Tiniest Town Is Sold And Renamed PhinDeli Town Buford, Wyoming ==References== ==Other websites== * Community of Buford * 2010 video interview from CNN Category:Unincorporated communities in Wyoming Category:Albany County, Wyoming Category:1866 establishments in the United States Category:1860s establishments in Wyoming Territory
